channel.title: git on goshSAMit
channel.description: Recent content in git on goshSAMit

item.title: Git Commands
item.description: Steps to connect to a git repo Create the repo on Github Create a folder on your local device that you want to old the repo git clone {repo_url_from_github} git remote set-url origin {repo_url_from_github} git config –global user.name “name" git config –global user.email “email” git branch newbranch git checkout newbranch make changes to code git add . git commit . -m “commit message” git push origin main Go to github and create a new pull request Steps to start a repo on local and push to github In Progress Various git commands git pull origin main ==> pulls from the main branch to local checked out branch git remote add {alias} {url} -> git remote add origin github.
